ygData.subject: Enchanting Platinum
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got level 34 last night and am about to buy my Enchant Platinum spell. I have been getting /tells for many levels already asking if I can enchant plat.
ygData.messageBody:
I just got level 34 last night and am about to buy my Enchant Platinum spell.
I have been getting /tells for many levels already asking if I can enchant
plat.

Do you all charge to do this for people and if so how much? I've even had
people ask me to do this in Solusek B which is a place I don't really want to
necessarily spend the mana on enchanting metal just for the heck of it.

Thanks,
Cariel Kalyn
Enchanter - 34th : )
Fennin Ro
